snippet: Money managers have been buying the new bonds of the region’s financial institutions, a good sign for banks. But the bonds could leave investors exposed.
abstract: Money managers have been buying the new bonds of the region’s financial institutions, a good sign for banks. But the bonds could leave investors exposed.

headline.main: In a Switch, Investors Are Buying European Bank Bonds
headline.print_headline: European Bank Debt Is, Surprisingly, Selling
